segments.text: Hi , still in the office ? It ’ s already 7 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to go but I have to finish a very important presentation . Our boss needs it for tomorrow ’ s morning meeting and I was given the complete information only late this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds like our boss . Typically him always late with important information . Anything I can help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that will be great . Thank you so much . Please help me to double-check the name list . I have to make sure they are all correct .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , shall I make a coffee first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not for me . It is already late . I can not fall asleep after drinking coffee this late .
segments.speaker: S2
